text: Arthur Metrano (September 22, 1936 – September 8, 2021) was an American actor and comedian. He was best known for his role as Lt./Capt./Cmdt. Mauser in Police Academy 2 and Police Academy 3. Metrano was born in New York City. His career began in 1961 and he retired in 2008. On September 8, 2021, Metrano died at his home in Aventura, Florida of natural causes, aged 84.Art Metrano, Stand-Up Comic and ‘Police Academy’ Actor, Dies at 84 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
